title: [Placements] Help me understand the placements timeline
content: Is the placements stuff that happens during 7th sem our last chance at trying for tier 1 companies? Or do we get to try for them again during 8th sem? Cause I feel like I haven't done enough things to put on my resume. I want more time

comments.body: Most tier 1 companies do come in 7th sem, few (but not zero) in 8th sem. You still have time to build up your resume now. If there is a time-turner, that's the only way you'll go back in time

first 2 to 3 months in 7th semester , most of the top companies come with internship + FTE offers where you  do  the internship in 8th sem and FTE later. 8th sem onwards lesser internship +FTE offers and just FTE  or just internship offers will be coming. some exceptions are ofc there.  
But you still have 1 month approx to build your resume. so all the best. make sure to add your sem projects and deploy them if you can.
You need to keep an eye out for the placement details.
Also what if I get only an internship offer? Then how can I get an FTE?
other companies come only for FTE , you are still eligible for them.
make your project live on internet.If you deploy you will get a link for that project and you can put it on your resume or any where else you want to show it.
